entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.KeysCollection.Contains #75936
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Prefer .Length/Count/IsEmpty over Any() #75933
    8.0.0
  • SPMI coreclr test collection issue #75931
    8.0.0
  • IOS CultureInfo does not contain NativeName #75927
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails with two nested classes of the same name #75926
  • Optimization potential for tuple-style assignments #75925
    Future
  • Logs: Exlude [NativeBinary]: hostfxr.dll and hostpolicy.dll files in .net 6 #75923
  • Tar: string fields are truncated when they don't fit but we should throw instead #75921
  • Review duplication of loads in the Jit #75916
    8.0.0
  • .NET CLR profiling API does not return ELEMENT_TYPE_GENERICINST on generic method #75903
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness #75901
    8.0.0
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on method already marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #75898
  • Release-only build has errors due to ResolvedMatchingContract when re-compiling in Visual Studio #75897
  • Remove redundant initialization to keep consistent style #75893
    8.0.0
  • Vector128.Min<int> produces sub-optimal code on x64 #75892
    8.0.0
  • Expression.Compile performance regression on .NET7 RC1 #75891
  • Socket ConnectAsync returns successfully with a non-connected socket if canceled #75889
  • NetworkInformationException when querying network interfaces in WSL 1 #75883
  • On a Mac, dotnet app results in CoreCLR error or FileNotFound exception if parent path folder names contain slashes #75882
  • [Perf] Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilitiesBenchmark #75907
  • net6.0-ios/debugging: no listener on any ipv6 address on port 10000 but debugged app try to connect to ipv6 addresses #75877
  • [API Proposal]: System.Threading.Relaxed.Read #75874
    Future
  • The HttpClient hangs with GetProxyForUrl #75873

Closed

  • Crst ordering issue between threadpool and Process.EnableRaisingEvents under GCStress #38801
    8.0.0
  • Test failure CoreMangLib\\system\\multicastdelegate\\MulticastDelegateEquals\\MulticastDelegateEquals.cmd #75868
  • Make sure hard limit and large pages work together when the hard limits are not page aligned. #54616
    8.0.0
  • Out of bounds array access in GC #75214
    8.0.0
  • SignedXmlTest.VerifyXmlResolver sometimes failing due to failing to connect to localhost. #74115
    7.0.0
  • Where is System.UInt128? #75924
  • Improve LoggerMessageGenerator parser to check for invalid partial method body when LoggerMessageAttribute is on method definition #75731
    Future
  • Is it possible to create new locales or update an existing one in Net 6? #75880
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Numerics #72410
    7.0.0
  • clang-14: unknown argument: '-gcc-toolchain' #75505
    7.0.0
  • Can Single and Double BinaryPrimitives methods be added to nuget packages that target .NET Standard 2.0? #75000
    Future
  • Confusion regarding Volatile.Read guarantees, and example in the volatile docs #67330
    Future
  • Consider setting hostRequirements for Codespaces #75680
    8.0.0
  • Inefficient Vector128.Equals* comparisons on Arm64 #75849
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryPrimitives #75900
  • services.Configure<SomeDictionaryOptions>(configuration) failure at PublishAot #75869
  • .NET 6 reading standard output blocks on Linux #74402
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional - HTTP/3 timeouts (mostly on NativeAOT) #75493
    7.0.0
  • warning CS1685: The predefined type 'System.ObsoleteAttribute' is defined in multiple assemblies in the global alias #75859
  • GCStress crash stable repro #75792
    7.0.0
  • On Linux, the `KeyChar` of the `ConsoleKeyInfo` returned from `Ctrl+c` becomes `\0` with .NET 7-RC.1 #75795
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.GetGCMemoryInfo #74902
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalPauseDuration\\GetTotalPauseDuration.cmd #74631
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump intellisense package for RC2 to include latest comments for Numerics #75938
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump intellisense package for main to include latest comments for Numerics #75937
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update compiler build #75935
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75932
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Memory
  • Skip ASN.1 SetOf sorting if nothing to sort #75928
    tenet-performance, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Preserve last error for patchpoint helpers #75922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dummy commit #75920
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Formats.Tar sln and tests csproj small changes #75919
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Keep all icall wrappers in profile only mode, the generated co… #75918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75917
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • Allow Hardware Intrinsics to work with the AltJit #75912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused configuration values #75911
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make initialization more consistent in `gc.cpp` #75908
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed internalProperties group. #75904
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] Fix servicing failures when building coreclr nuget packages #75899
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add the ability to start and stop IHostedService instances concurrently #75894
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve total L2 size calculation logic on osx-arm64 #75881
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add markdown readme for Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json #75876
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fixing SpanHelpers.LastIndexOfAnyValueType to no longer create out of bounds GC refs #75885
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid array out of bound access for commit accounting #75232
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Removed internalProperties group. #75906
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete duplicative code in WebClient #75896
    area-System.Net
  • Delete a few stray commented-out Console.WriteLine calls in src #75895
  • Ensure that the VNFunc for HWIntrinsics are properly marked as commutative where possible #75840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 and fix memory usage issues found while doing so #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75875
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, source-generator
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Try re-enabling System.Transactions.Local tests on Arm64 #75703
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] KeyChar should be preserved for Ctrl+Letter #75861
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix querying L3 cache size on osx-x64 #75870
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75717
    area-Meta
  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Faster Vector128/64 compare on arm64 #75864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace XmlCharType.IsDigit with char.IsAsciiDigit #75871
    area-System.Xml
  • Updating the initial capacity of the intrinsic TypeConverter dictionary #75850
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Fix servicing failures when building coreclr nuget packages #75884
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use fixed version of dotnet for Spmi benchmark #75888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing SpanHelpers.LastIndexOfAnyValueType to no longer create out of bounds GC refs #75857
    area-System.Memory
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75713
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add definition of hostfxr_get_dotnet_environment_info_fn to hostfxr.h #75860
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket support on Unix, Review Changes #74645
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • KeyChar should be preserved for Ctrl+Letter #75853
    area-System.Console
  • [wasm] Add Vector128:ExtractMostSignificantBits #75844
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Initialize Volatile value #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix querying L3 cache size on osx-x64 #75854
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: move optOptimizeBools later in the phase list #75842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Join the special sweep decision #75572
    area-GC-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Prevent exception when attempting to write PaxTarEntry obtained from TarReader #75237
    area-System.IO
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add missing inheritdocs references to IParsable.TryParse #75856
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • Faster "obj is T[]" for sealed T #75816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Optimize AwayFromZero rounding #74935
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add test mode that scans JIT disassembly output #75039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #75813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.11
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #75829
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • WIP: Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #75172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Resolve constrained static virtual calls in gshared methods. #75839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #75863
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #75721
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix x64 cross build on arm64 macOS #75677
    os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • replace ToUtf8 with Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes #75834
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Expand delegate calls in morph #75841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Use clock_gettime_nsec_np if available in GCToOSInterface::GetLowPrecisionTimeStamp #75862
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConditionalSelect intrinsics for Amd64 #75838
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid and unknown locale warnings for package assets should be gated on TFM #28058
  • Opt-in for providing basic Hardware Information #28055
  • Improve PR build reliability from Razor file copy #28052
  • Code Coverage for RuntimeIdentifiers #28048
  • dotnet nuget --store-password-in-clear-text options doesn't work on docker #28028
  • [NetSDKE2E]Running "dotnet publish -f net7.0" with .net7 rc2 SDK,the output shown contains an invalid character "-". #28022

Closed

  • dotnet test --verbosity doesn't list tests as they're run in 6.0 Preview 4 #16122
  • CppUnitTestFramework is being included in linux .NET SDK #26590
  • [NetSDKE2E]With .NET 7 RC2 SDK, run failed for .NET 7 winforms/wpf. #27685

PullRequests

Created

  • [Backport] Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28061
  • Gate warnings for localization asset locales on TFM >= 7 #28060
  • Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28057
  • Add more mapping tests #28037
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Prevent `dotnet test` verbosity from being ignored #27992
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28021
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1999114 #27667
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Expand existing EOL warning to target 5.0 #27943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.110
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add more test cases for producing reference assemblies #27751

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generator - Visual representation of generated .g.cs files in Solution Explorer never updates #64162
  • Change value escape of 'out' parameters to ReturnOnly #64155
  • Add support for Go to Implementation #64146
    17.4
  • Invalid hyperlink in JavaScript diagnostics #64145
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Snippet Working List #64144
    17.4
  • 'To file-scoped namespace in solution' breaks ASP.NET Core WebApp template #64143
  • Performance: Improve `GetTypeByMetadataName` fail path #64142

Closed

  • Files added via a code action aren't included in the project file #64157
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32920.147 #64151
  • StackTraceExplorer ContextMenus icons not themed appropriately #64060
    17.4
  • It looks like ```RefEscapeScope``` is incorrectly calculated for a scoped local inside an explicit block. #64009
    17.4
  • Missing CS8166 when accessing [UnscopedRef] property to assing to an unscoped local #63526
    17.4
  • `fixed` buffer index access false type with semantic model analysis #63993
    17.5
  • Expose "IsGeneratedCode" on analysis contexts #7578
    Backlog
  • Implement the separate return scope #64100
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce the new EA extensibility points for UnitTesting to actually implement/export to light up in the forked solution crawler. #64164
    Area-IDE
  • don't run compiler-only tests unless there is a compiler change #64163
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the ILegacyWorkspaceDescriptor concept #64161
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Cherrypick for 17.3: Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #64159
    Area-IDE
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `for` statement. #64154
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Change RSTE of RTRS to ReturnOnly by default #64152
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Hook up the new remote-solution-events-stream to the UnitTest-SolutionCrawler. #64150
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64153
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Pass cancellationToken to input processor #64141
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove the usage of grid in Inheritance margin #64138
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed and Allow pointers of managed types in some contexts #64064
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Hard 'fork' the solution crawler code. Placing the fork in the unit-testing EA layer. #64149
    Area-IDE
  • Rename 'Solution Events' to 'Legacy Solution Events' #64147
    Area-IDE
  • Fix color issues for Stack Trace Explorer context menu #64134
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic snippets - interface snippet #64022
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't place bogus data in an in/out variable in venus #64148
    Area-IDE, Next
  • `scoped` should set ref escape scope to current block #64093
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Add service which exists to tell OOP about solution events #64127
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64140
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64139
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64167
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64165
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable GeneratedFilesOut for VB #63759
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Compiler outputs #63882
    Area-Compilers
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix missing Analyzer property ref in build #64129
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix parsing of lambda parameter named "scoped" #64085
    Area-Compilers
  • Example is not packable #64133
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Write custom authentication failure information to the response body #44100
  • [Blazor] Blazor App Randomly Freezes #44098
  • Perf regression: endpoint #44097
  • Update React and Angular project templates to the latest versions #44092
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Use more localized strategy for resolving WellKnownTypes in analyzers #44090
  • Blazor Wasm SubDomain Routing #44089
    Discussions
  • JavaScript to C# argument passing achieves a whopping 235 kb/s of throughput #44088
  • Issue when YARP is combined into a "normal" app #44085
  • force full render / avoid differential render flag #44084
  • WebApplication.RunAsync does not accept a cancellation token #44083
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Owin.OwinEnvironment doesn't implement CopyTo which breaks owin's UseErrorPage #44082
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc] With NET7 RC2 installed, a duplicate template display in dotnet new --list #44095
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44080

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #44079
  • DotNetObjectReference multiple instances created, only last one disposed #44064
  • Blazor WASM routing issue #44071
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json, plaintext_nodejs #44044
  • Kestrel should trigger ConnectionClosedRequested on HTTP/2 and HTT/3 GOAWAYs #42057
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Assembly loading failed #43326

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement OwinEnvironment.CopyTo and add Tests - Fixes #44082 #44099
    community-contribution
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Rolling back SDK to last stable version to fix builds #44087
    area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling redux #44077

Merged

  • [6.0] Revert Ubuntu.1804.Armarch.Open change #44074
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `822849d` to `f94b3a5` #44050
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [7.0] Revert Ubuntu.1804.Armarch.Open change #44073
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • [6.0] Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] [WebView] Avoid Base64 encoding because Json Serializer should do that #43923
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in NavigateToLogin doc comments #43933
    area-blazor
  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
